import mysql.connector

conn = mysql.connector.connect(host="localhost", user="root", passwd="1234", database="sundeep")

cur = conn.cursor()

cur.execute("create table students (rollno int primary key, name varchar(30),percentage float, branch varchar(10))")

conn.close()
source.8aa03063:
import mysql.connector
import xlrd

conn = mysql.connector.connect(host="localhost", user="root", passwd="1234", database="sundeep")

cur = conn.cursor()

loc = ("C:\\Users\\jkxwo\\Desktop\\Project - StudentToMySQL\\Students.xlsx")

l = list()

a = xlrd.open_workbook(loc)

sheet = a.sheet_by_index(0)

sheet.cell_value(0,0)

for i in range(1,21):
    l.append(tuple(sheet.row_values(i)))

# print(l)

q = "insert into students(rollno, name, percentage, branch) values(%s,%s,%s,%s)"

cur.executemany(q, l)
conn.commit()
conn.close()
source.e357697a: # Insert you excel (student.xlsx) file into table (students)
source.28e5bfbb: # Using Python Jupyter to creat a new table(students) in sundeep dataset
source.517ba9ac: # Check dataset by using MySQL command Line client
